title: Poro-Snax Cookies :3
body:
I recently had a bake sale and made some Poro-Snax cookies~
Some people from my university's LoL group came to visit but I think it was too snowy that day for people to make the trek ^_^; anyways I still wanna share my creation so I thought I'd try posting here (I went all out and made packaging for it lol, I drew the Poro too!)

(and how I made it is I basically I just found a chewy chocolate cookie recipe and made the swirly design while it was still warm)

replies.body: Swiggty swoogty, I'm coming for the cookie~ {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
These are awesome! I've only seen them done as cinnamon cookies before!
